document.full_text: elvis andrus stroked a game-winning rbi single with two outs to complete a ninth-inning comeback in the texas rangers' 7-6 victory over the kansas city royals on sunday.
document.title: rangers sting royals with ninth-inning comeback win
lines_and_colors: elvis andrus stroked a game-winning rbi single with two outs to complete a ninth-inning comeback in the texas rangers' 7-6 victory over the kansas city royals on sunday.
